author: cnbc.com
title: NIC’s Gov2Go Platform Named a Finalist for the ACT-IAC Igniting Innovation Awards
text:
Gov2Go is the first personal assistant for government.
WASHINGTON, D.C.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Gov2Go, the nation's first personal assistant for government, has been selected as a finalist in the American Council for Technology and Industry Advisory Council (ACT-IAC) Igniting Innovation Awards competition which recognizes highly innovative IT products, services, systems and solutions that benefit government and citizens. The competition will take place during the ACT-IAC Igniting Innovation Conference and Awards on May 11, 2018, in Washington, DC.
Gov2Go is a nationwide platform solution that delivers essential federal, state, and local government services to citizens quickly and easily via the devices they use today. Gov2Go is designed to bring together all citizen interactions—at every level of government—onto one convenient platform in a way that is personalized, timely, and relevant.
“NIC is proud to deliver innovative solutions that make it easier for citizens to interact with their government,” said Amy Sawyer, NIC General Manager. “And we are delighted that Gov2Go has been selected as finalist for this year’s ACT-IAC Igniting Innovation Awards.”
Gov2Go is more than some future vision of government—it is being used today by citizens across the country. Key services are available in all 50 states, and governments are continually adding unique services to the Gov2Go platform for the benefit of their constituents. In Arkansas, for example, more than 20 percent of the population use Gov2Go to receive notifications for a suite of services that includes vehicle registration renewals, property tax payments, and more.
About Gov2Go
Developed by NIC Inc. (Nasdaq: EGOV) Gov2Go is the nation's first personal assistant for government bringing together all interactions with all levels of government in one convenient platform. Gov2Go learns about a citizen's government interactions, tracks deadlines, notifies citizens, and completes the transactions within Gov2Go with one-click payments. The citizen-centric platform removes the stress of remembering and completing infrequent government interactions, by providing personalized, timely, and relevant information. People in all 50 states can use Gov2Go to access government services using a variety of technology including the Gov2Go website, mobile devices, Apple Watch, and Apple TV. More information is available at www.egov.com/gov2go.com .
About NIC
NIC Inc. (Nasdaq: EGOV) is the nation's premier provider of innovative digital government solutions and secure payment processing, which help make government interactions more accessible for everyone through technology. The family of NIC companies has developed a library of more than 13,000 digital government services for more than 6,000 federal, state, and local government agencies. Among these solutions is the ground-breaking personal assistant for government, Gov2Go, delivering citizens personalized reminders and a single platform for all government interactions. More information is available at www.egov.com .
